org.hibernate.ogm.datastore.couchdb.options.navigation

Interface CouchDBGlobalContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DocumentStoreGlobalContext<CouchDBGlobalContext,CouchDBEntityContext>, GlobalContext<CouchDBGlobalContext,CouchDBEntityContext>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CouchDBGlobalContextImpl

    public interface CouchDBGlobalContext
extends DocumentStoreGlobalContext<CouchDBGlobalContext,CouchDBEntityContext>
    Allows to configure CouchDB-specific options applying on a global level. These options may be overridden for single entities or properties.
    Author:
    Gunnar Morling

      • Methods inherited from interface org.hibernate.ogm.datastore.document.options.navigation.DocumentStoreGlobalContext
